statements: SELECT * FROM message;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM message;
SELECT message_text FROM message WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT message_id, message_text, sent_at FROM message WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(message_id) AS total_messages FROM message;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_sent_messages FROM message GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT receiver_id, MAX(sent_at) AS last_received_message FROM message GROUP BY receiver_id;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_sent_messages FROM message WHERE sent_at >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sent_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id = receiver_id;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM message;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE message_text ILIKE '%hello%' OR message_text ILIKE '%hi%';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(DISTINCT receiver_id) AS total_unique_contacts FROM message GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_sent_messages FROM message HAVING COUNT(message_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM message ORDER BY sent_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_sent_messages FROM message WHERE sent_at >= '2022-01-01' AND sent_at < '2022-02-01' GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM sent_at)) AS avg_response_time FROM message GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING COUNT(message_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id = '123' AND receiver_id = '456';
SELECT message_text FROM message WHERE sender_id = '789';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM message WHERE sent_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id = '101' OR receiver_id = '202';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message WHERE sender_id = '303';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id = '404' ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM message;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id IN ('111', '222', '333');
SELECT * FROM message WHERE receiver_id = '555' AND message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) FROM message GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT MAX(sent_at), MIN(sent_at) FROM message;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM message GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM sent_at) = 10;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM message WHERE sender_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY sender_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id = '777' UNION SELECT * FROM message WHERE receiver_id = '888';
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM message GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sent_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT message_text FROM message WHERE sender_id = '999' AND sent_at BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT sender_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM sent_at)) AS avg_time FROM message GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sent_at) AS year FROM message;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students;
SELECT email FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM Instructors;
SELECT email FROM Instructors;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' OR student_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'John' OR instructor_name = 'Jane';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id > 100;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, instructor_name FROM Students JOIN Instructors ON Students.student_id = Instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT instructor_id FROM Instructors);
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = (SELECT MAX(student_id) FROM Students);
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = (SELECT MIN(student_id) FROM Students);
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_instructors FROM Instructors;
SELECT * FROM Students UNION SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = (SELECT student_id FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'Jane Smith');
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = (SELECT MAX(instructor_id) FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe');
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = (SELECT MIN(instructor_id) FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'Alice');
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = (SELECT AVG(instructor_id) FROM Instructors);
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Instructors;
SELECT * FROM Messages;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, message_text FROM Messages;
SELECT message_id, message_timestamp FROM Messages;
SELECT student_name, student_email, instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Students, Instructors;
SELECT student_name, student_email, sender_id, recipient_id, message_text FROM Students, Messages;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email, sender_id, recipient_id, message_text FROM Instructors, Messages;
SELECT student_name, student_email, instructor_name, instructor_email, sender_id, recipient_id, message_text FROM Students, Instructors, Messages;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT instructor_name FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 2;
SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE message_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, instructor_name, message_text FROM Students, Instructors, Messages WHERE Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id AND Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name, message_text FROM Students INNER JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id INNER JOIN Instructors ON Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id;

SELECT student_name AS student, instructor_name AS instructor, message_text AS message FROM Students, Instructors, Messages WHERE Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id AND Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Instructors;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, recipient_id, message_text, message_timestamp FROM Messages;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM Messages WHERE message_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM Messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM Instructors JOIN Messages ON Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id;
SELECT Students.student_name, Messages.message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT Instructors.instructor_name, Messages.message_text FROM Instructors JOIN Messages ON Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS num_students FROM Students;
SELECT COUNT(instructor_id) AS num_instructors FROM Instructors;
SELECT COUNT(message_id) AS num_messages FROM Messages;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(message_id) AS num_messages FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(message_id) AS num_messages FROM Instructors JOIN Messages ON Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id GROUP BY instructor_name;
SELECT student_name, AVG(message_timestamp) AS avg_timestamp FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT instructor_name, AVG(message_timestamp) AS avg_timestamp FROM Instructors JOIN Messages ON Instructors.instructor_id = Messages.recipient_id GROUP BY instructor_name;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_department FROM instructors;
SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, recipient_id FROM messages;
SELECT * FROM conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, student_id, instructor_id FROM conversations;
SELECT student_name, student_course FROM students;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_department FROM instructors;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, message_content FROM messages;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email, instructor_department FROM instructors;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_course FROM students;
SELECT message_id, message_content, message_date FROM messages;
SELECT conversation_id, start_date, end_date FROM conversations;
SELECT student_name, student_id, student_course FROM students;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_id, instructor_department FROM instructors;
SELECT sender_id, message_content, message_date FROM messages;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email, instructor_department FROM instructors;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_course FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_course = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_course = 'Computer Science';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_department FROM instructors WHERE instructor_department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN conversations ON students.student_id = conversations.student_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, message_content FROM students JOIN messages ON students.student_id = messages.sender_id;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name, message_date FROM students JOIN conversations ON students.student_id = conversations.student_id JOIN instructors ON conversations.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE end_date IS NULL;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM students JOIN conversations ON students.student_id = conversations.student_id JOIN instructors ON conversations.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE student_course = 'Physics';
SELECT student_name, AVG(message_id) AS average_message_id FROM students JOIN messages ON students.student_id = messages.sender_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM conversations WHERE end_date IS NULL);
SELECT student_name, MAX(message_date) FROM students JOIN messages ON students.student_id = messages.sender_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM students JOIN messages ON students.student_id = messages.sender_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name, student_course FROM students;
SELECT AVG(conversation_id) AS avg_conversation_id FROM conversations;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM conversations JOIN students ON conversations.student_id = students.student_id JOIN instructors ON conversations.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id GROUP BY student_name, instructor_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_conversations FROM students JOIN conversations ON students.student_id = conversations.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(conversation_id) AS avg_conversation_id FROM conversations WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE student_course = 'Biology');

SELECT student_name, MAX(conversation_id) AS max_conversation_id FROM students JOIN conversations ON students.student_id = conversations.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY max_conversation_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS unique_students FROM students;

SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students;

SELECT message_content, message_timestamp FROM messages;
SELECT student_id, instructor_id FROM student_instructor;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT instructor_name FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'info';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_instructor WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE message_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students;
SELECT MAX(message_timestamp) FROM messages;
SELECT AVG(message_content) FROM messages;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM instructors;
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS messages_sent FROM messages JOIN students ON messages.sender_id = students.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING messages_sent > 10;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_name, instructor_name FROM students s JOIN student_instructor si ON s.student_id = si.student_id JOIN instructors i ON si.instructor_id = i.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_timestamp FROM notifications WHERE recipient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_instructor WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004');
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp < '2023-06-01' ORDER BY notification_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005' AND receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174006';
SELECT student_name, instructor_name FROM students s, student_instructor si, instructors i WHERE s.student_id = si.student_id AND si.instructor_id = i.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND student_email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_content LIKE '%important%' OR message_content LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT notification_type, COUNT(notification_id) AS num_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY notification_type;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students s LEFT JOIN student_instructor si ON s.student_id = si.student_id;
SELECT SUM(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp > '2023-01-01';

SELECT student_name, instructor_name FROM students s JOIN student_instructor si ON s.student_id = si.student_id JOIN instructors i ON si.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE student_name = 'Bob' OR instructor_name = 'Jane';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(instructor_id) AS num_instructors FROM student_instructor GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(instructor_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = receiver_id;
